channel.title: The Sound Of AI - Open source Research
channel.description: Recent content on The Sound Of AI - Open source Research

item.description: Open Source Research # OpenSource Research is an experimental project which aims to create a piece of collaborative research in the field of AI music. The members of The Sound of AI (youtube channel) community collaborate to carry out research, following the philosophy and practices of open source software and open research. Kickoff video # Get Involved # Get Involved, fill up this survey... steps details in How can I get involved?
